metadata.title: CVE-2015-8893 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: app/aboot/aboot.c in the Qualcomm bootloader in Android before 2016-07-05on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (OS outage or buffer over-read) via a crafted application, akaAndroid internal bug 28822690 and Qualcomm internal bug CR822275.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
